results.title: TradePulse Technologies Named Runner-Up at BattleFin Alternative Data Conference in New York
results.description: NEW YORK, June 25, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- TradePulse Technologies, Inc., a fast-rising innovator in real-time order flow analytics, was named runner-up at the prestigious BattleFin Alternative Data Discovery Day, held June 10–11 in New York City. The recognition solidifies TradePulse's growing influence in the financial technology sector, especially in the rapidly advancing field of AI-driven market intelligence. TradePulse at BattleFin This year's conference, themed "AI: Data-Driven Research," brought together leading voices from the alternative data, artificial intelligence (AI), and large language model (LLM) industries. Hundreds of professionals, including data scientists, quantitative researchers, and institutional trading strategists, gathered to explore how data innovation is reshaping the future of financial decision-making. TradePulse stood out among top competitors for its unique focus on real-time order flow analytics powered by advanced AI algorithms that detect benchmark transactions driving stock price movements. These capabilities enable clients to uncover hidden signals and make informed, and data-driven trading decisions. "Being named a runner-up in the Alt-data challenge at BattleFin is a meaningful milestone for us," said Jay Lee, Business Development Manager at TradePulse, who presented the company's offerings and vision at the event. "It was an honor to represent TradePulse and demonstrate how our AI-powered data can bring unmatched insights to today's fast-moving markets. This recognition reinforces our mission and the impact we strive to make." TradePulse Technologies, Inc. is the U.S. subsidiary of Finit Co., Ltd., creator of PowerMap, a real-time analytics platform for Korean stocks. A leader in South Korea's order flow data, Finit uses proprietary algorithms and AI to deliver detailed inferred flow segmented by investor type, including market makers. PowerMap covers 1,200+ stocks, analyzing direct trade data for KOSPI stocks over 200B KRW ($133.38M) and KOSDAQ stocks over 150B KRW ($103.81M). TradePulse brings Finit's advanced inference models to over 4,000 U.S. tickers, providing real-time insights through custom indicators like buy intensity and large trade volume, with a focus on market maker activity. results.title: ترامب ردا على تقرير CNN: الغارات على إيران "من أنجح الضربات في التاريخ"
results.description: نفى الرئيس الأمريكي دونالد ترامب، عبر منصته "تروث سوشيال"، صحة تقرير شبكة CNN الذي يفيد بأن تقييما استخباراتيا أمريكيا أوليا خلص إلى أن الضربات التي استهدفت المنشآت النووية الإيرانية لم تدمر المكونات الأساسية لبرنامجها النووي.
